program P
const int size = 10, pera=88, perica=33, mikica=14, zika=11;
class Table {
    class Interna
    {
        int q,b;
        {
            void zbka()
            {

            }
        }
    }
    int pos[], neg[];
    int proba123;
    {
        void putp (int a, int idx, int idz) { this.pos[idx]=a; }
        void putn (int a, int idx) { this.neg[idx]=a; }
        int getp (int idx) { return pos[idx]; }
        int getn (int idx) { return neg[idx]; }
    }
}
{
    void main()
    int x, i;
    { //‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐ Initialize val
        blablabla= 5+4;
        val = new Table;
        val.pos = new int [size];
        val.neg = new int [size];
        i = 0;
        do
        {
            val.putp(0,i);
            val.putn(0,i);
            i++;
        }while (i < size);
//‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐ Read values
        read(x);
        do
        {
            if (x >= size) break;
            if (0 <= x && x < size)
            {
                val.putp(val.getp(x)+1);
            } else
            if (-size < x && x < 0)
            {
                val.putn(val.getn(-x)+1);
            }
            read(x);
        } while (true);
    }
}
